body.raw:
{
    "name": "RouteSlippery",
    "prefix": "/slippery/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,
    "strategy": {
        "type": "slippery"
    },
    "backends": [
        {
            "name": "Test1",
            "addr": "http://localhost:7070",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:7071/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "4xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.6,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:7070/"
        },
        {
            "name": "Test2",
            "addr": "http://localhost:9090",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:9091/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:9090/"
        }
    ]
}

{
    "name": "RouteSticky",
    "prefix": "/sticky/",

        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],

    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,

                {

{
    "name": "RouteShadow",
    "prefix": "/shadow/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,
    "strategy": {
        "type": "shadow",
        "shadow_backend": "Test2"
    },
    "backends": [
        {
            "name": "Test1",
            "addr": "http://localhost:7070",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:7071/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",

                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "4xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.6,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:7070/"
        },
               {
            "name": "Test2",
            "addr": "http://localhost:9090",
            "weight": 0,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:9091/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:9090/"
        }
    ]
}

{
    "name": "RouteHeader",
    "prefix": "/header/",
    "methods": [
        "GET",
        "POST"
    ],
    "host": "*",
    "rewrite": "/",
    "cookie_ttl": 120000000000,
    "strategy": {
        "type": "header",
        "header_name": "ToTest2",
        "header_value": "true",
        "old_backend": "Test1",
        "new_backend": "Test2"
    },
    "backends": [
        {
            "name": "Test1",
            "addr": "http://localhost:7070",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:7071/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],

                {

                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "5xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.3,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "4xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.6,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:7070/"
        },
               {
            "name": "Test2",
            "addr": "http://localhost:9090",
            "weight": 100,
            "active": false,
            "scrape_url": "http://localhost:9091/metrics",
            "scrape_metrics": [
                "go_goroutines"
            ],
            "metric_thresholds": [
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "ResponseTime",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 1000,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                },
                {
                    "status": false,
                    "metric": "6xxRate",
                    "operator": ">",
                    "threshold": 0.1,
                    "active_for": 10,
                    "trigger_time": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z"
                }
            ],
            "healthcheck_url": "http://localhost:9090/"
        }
    ]
}
